DOC.detailed_description: Study Design : The study convenience population study 6-month randomise control trial ( RCT ) men woman age 55 70 year . The study group ( n=60 per group ) RCT : 1 . CON - control group receive placebo nutrient support ( per kg body mass : 0.25g maltodextrin ; energy ~ 160 kcal per day ) 2 . PRO - nutrient group receive nutrient support ( per kg body mass : 0.33g milk protein + 0.25ug vitamin D + 10mg calcium ; energy ~ 160 kcal per day ) 3 . PRO+PA - nutrient group receive nutrient support ( per kg body mass : 0.33g milk protein + 0.25ug vitamin D + 10mg calcium ; energy ~ 160 kcal per day ) engage prescribed physical activity ( PA ) . Subject recruitment : Men woman , age 50 70 year , recruit UL Body Composition Study , email advertisement , GP-exercise referral scheme , feature article ( ) local medium word mouth . Requirement participant . On entry subject undertake preliminary assessment follow : i. medical history examination qualify medical doctor ; ii . provide blood urine sample evaluate qualified medical doctor ; iii . food intake evaluate qualified dietician ; iv . whole body segmental body composition analysis ( DXA ) ; v. habitual physical activity level ( PAL ) vi . measurement muscle function performance simulate activity daily live . One month follow preliminary assessment subject invite participate 6 month intervention programme nutrient nutrient plus physical activity . Consenting subject randomly assign one three study group state . Upon completion ( 6 month ) , subject re-assessed follow ; i. provide blood urine sample ; ii . whole body segmental body composition analysis ( DXA ) ; iii . measurement muscle function performance simulate activity daily live .
